TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProxyWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart
Public MustInherit Class ProxyWebPart Inherits WebPart

Docs.summary: Represents the base class for Web Parts controls that under certain conditions must replace other Web Parts controls on a page.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> 是一組 Web 組件控制項的基底類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>，可做為預留位置的頁面上的其他 Web 組件控制項。 一般而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>某種類型的錯誤或失敗發生時，控制項將會取代另一個 Web 組件控制項。 例如，當使用者未獲授權檢視頁面上的 Web 組件控制項，Web 組件控制項的預定取代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>控制項。 當無法載入 Web 組件控制項，或無法建立它的新執行個體時，取代原始的 Web 組件控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控制項。 如果 Web 組件控制項稍後想要變得可供使用者，它將會還原至頁面和物件衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>類別將會移除。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>類別不會儲存檢視狀態或控制項的狀態。 如果 Web 組件控制項取代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件，並在之後變成可用，其檢視狀態和控制項狀態會是空的。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件會保留個人化資料，這些 Web 組件控制項取代它。 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項變成可用時，將會還原其個人化資料。
當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項儲存個人化資料，不會儲存屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件。 相反地，它會將儲存控制項的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件取代。 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項可供使用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項將會自動將其載入。
<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>物件包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件。 Web 組件控制項可以從擷取的預定的識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>屬性。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件會取代為提供者或取用者的 Web 組件連接的 Web 組件控制項、 連線未啟用，但不是會被刪除。 如果原始的 Web 組件控制項變成可用時，連接將會重新啟動。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected ProxyWebPart (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed
protected: ProxyWebPart(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPart);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart

Docs.param: The Web Parts control to be replaced.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class when a static Web Parts control (or server or user control) must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項，以取代靜態 Web 組件控制項。 若要取代動態建立的 Web 組件控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>建構函式來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項。

Docs.exception: has an empty property \- or - is an empty \- or - is of type and its child control has an empty property

MemberSignature.Value: protected ProxyWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Protected Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
protected: ProxyWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);
new System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart : string * string * string * string -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart

Docs.param: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the control to replace. If a control is replaced, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
A string that is the name of the of the control to replace. If a control is replaced, the type name is the type of its child server control.
A string that contains the path to the user control to replace.
A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control is being replaced. This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class when a dynamic Web Parts control must be replaced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項，以取代動態的 Web 組件控制項。 若要取代靜態 Web 組件控制項，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>建構函式來建立 proxy Web 組件控制項。

Docs.exception: is specified but is or an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件取代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控制項，此屬性包含的值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件會包含在相同的值及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.ID%2A>屬性做為它所取代的控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.LoadControlState%2A>方法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以防止載入的控制項狀態。 方法不會載入的控制項狀態，或執行任何其他動作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.LoadViewState%2A>方法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以防止載入檢視狀態。 此方法不會載入檢視狀態或執行任何其他動作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>物件會取代 Web 組件控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>屬性包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的已取代的控制項。 如果已取代的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件，此屬性包含來自識別碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。
